Features.Description:
As a User
	I want to order products from the web application
	So that I can enjoy my favorite coffee

I add Santa Rita Cerrado Mineiro coffee to the shopping cart

I add La Soledad Antioquia coffee to the shopping cart
I should have $77 in the confirmation notification message

I add multiple pieces of coffees to the shopping cart
